item.title: API guidelines
item.description: Enterprise API Guidelines API Style Guideline Inspired by Zalandoâ€™s API Guidelines. The requirement level keywords “MUST”, “MUST NOT”, “REQUIRED”, “SHALL”, “SHALL NOT”, “SHOULD”, “SHOULD NOT”, “RECOMMENDED”, “MAY”, and “OPTIONAL” used in this document (case insensitive) are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119. A. API Specification and Documentation MUST provide and publish API specifications using OpenAPI. MUST create or update API documentation in the developer portal. SHOULD provide comprehensive documentation, from straight-forward getting started examples to in-depth details on all request and response parameters.
